column1: Little Goat Diner////As I sat and looked around I was just enamoured - the design of everything from the booths
column2: the counter in front of the kitchen
column3: the bar in Little Goat Bread (beside the diner)
column4: and even the windows on the ceiling in the middle of the room - it was all just wonderful and homy. Plus
column5: any place that plays at least one Fleetwood Mac song while I'm there is a winner in my book! Â I'll definitely be back
column6: but maybe at a less busy hour - in an attempt to avoid mistakes and slightly frantic workers.
